results.name: Numbers in the (2,1)-Pascal triangle A029653 that are different from 1.
reference: D. M. Bressoud, Proofs and Confirmations, Camb. Univ. Press, 1999; triangle on page 6, numerators.
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..11325 (rows 1 <= n <= 150)
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Alternating Sign Matrix.
D. Zeilberger, Dave Robbins's Art of Guessing, Adv. in Appl. Math. 34 (2005), 939-954.
mathematica: Table[(Binomial[n + 2, k + 1] + Binomial[n + 1, k] + Binomial[n, k] - Binomial[n, k + 1])/2, {n, 0, 11}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jun 29 2018 *)
